event.title: was elevated into a status of a town under the decree of Spanish Superior Government on February 15, 1753

data.event: This small village later was elevated into a status of a town under the decree of Spanish Superior Government on February 15, 1753.

event.title: Years back, a parish was already existing

data.event: Years back, a parish was already existing which was also made under the same decree.
This parish adopted "The Most Holy Trinity" as its patron; its feastday is celebrated every Sunday after the Pentecost.Known for best noodles called pansit bato.
